name: dbviewer
description: Viewer application that connects to patent DB

scripts.sqlip: docker start sqlserver & docker inspect --format '{{.NetworkSettings.Networks.nat.IPAddress}}' sqlserver
scripts.start: for /f "usebackq delims=" %a in (`docker inspect --format '{{.NetworkSettings.Networks.nat.IPAddress}}' sqlserver`) do @set SQLIP=%a & electron .

author: Bill Farmilo
